channel.title: Maximum Reality | System Breach
channel.description: Encrypted updates from Azul's Lab and Mochkil's Kitchen.

item.title: [!] BREACH_SUCCESSFUL: AZUL_OS LIVE
item.description: The firewall has been bypassed. Surveillance footage of operative Azul is now available in the /SURVEILLANCE/ directory.

item.title: NEW SECTOR: SNACK_ATTACK.RAW
item.description: Mochkil has seized the kitchen mainframe. Michelin-star chaos is imminent. Play the arcade dash now.
